QuestData.Title: The Assault on Shaol'mara
QuestData.Description: Our scouting efforts along the coast have given us valuable intelligence about the island, $c.$B$BHowever, we will accomplish nothing if we do not advance forward onto the mainland.$B$BI have assembled a team of our most elite aerial units to begin the attack.$B$BI would like you to join the assault. A champion such as yourself could turn the battle in our favor at the critical moment.$B$BWhen you are ready to begin the attack, speak to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Assault on Shaol'mara. Speak to Jaina Proudmoore to begin the attack.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes! You have done it, champion!$B$BNow, the Thunder King will taste the full force of the Kirin Tor!
